Zoho Campaigns is an email marketing pla: Zoho Campaigns is an email marketing platform for managing mailing lists, sending campaigns, tracking engagement, and automating subscriber workflows.

Add a new contact or update an existing: Add a new contact or update an existing one. Confirmation email sent based on mailing list settings.

Remove a tag from a contact.
Remove a contact from a mailing list.
Add contacts to your mailing lists.

Locate an existing campaign by campaign: Locate an existing campaign by campaign name.
